sys_ux_client_script.name: Custom Form

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_b063001b47f56150265ad698436d43f1
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="New Deduction default">77170ba64779ed10265ad698436d431f</macroponent><name>Custom Form</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    var icon = {
        id: 'my-icon',
        type: 'icon',
        options: {
            icon: 'info-circle'
        }
    };

    var field1 = {
        id: 'field1',
        type: 'input',
        label: 'Field 1'
    };

    var field2 = {
        id: 'field2',
        type: 'input',
        label: 'Field 2'
    };

    var form = {
        id: 'my-form',
        type: 'form',
        options: {
            fields: [field1, field2],
            actions: []
        }
    };

    var container = {
        id: 'my-container',
        type: 'container',
        options: {
            items: [icon, form]
        }
    };

    imports.addComponent(container);
}






]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>bryan.rodriguez@employbridge.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-03-30 14:30:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>b063001b47f56150265ad698436d43f1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Custom Form</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Voluntary Deductions" source="x_ebh_voluntary_0">591c37a24729a110265ad698436d431e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Voluntary Deductions">591c37a24729a110265ad698436d431e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_b063001b47f56150265ad698436d43f1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>bryan.rodriguez@employbridge.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-03-30 14:35:25</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
